milestones.title: Client Onboarding & Comprehensive Analysis
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Establish a strong foundational understanding of the telehealth industry, set up essential tools, and create a foundational strategy for digital marketing and brand positioning.

deliverables.title: Business Market Research
deliverables.description: Comprehensive analysis of the telehealth business market

tooltip.action: Conduct in-depth research on the Australian telehealth industry to identify trends, key players, market growth, and regulatory environment.
tooltip.tools: Use platforms like SimilarWeb, Statista, BigQuery and Google Trends.
tooltip.deliverable: Market Research Report detailing industry landscape, growth projections, consumer trends, and a summary of regulations affecting telehealth.
tooltip.progressTracking: Review weekly progress by assessing insights gathered and ensure the report is on track for end-of-month delivery.

deliverables.title: Setup Access & Agreement
deliverables.description: Setup access to Google Analytics, Facebook

deliverables.title: Competition Analysis
deliverables.description: Competitor analysis in the medical space

deliverables.title: Current Asset Review
deliverables.description: Analyze current digital assets and identify gaps

deliverables.title: Communication Setup
deliverables.description: Establish project management and communication tools

milestones.title: Branding & Content Creation
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Develop a cohesive brand identity and create compelling content strategy to establish a strong market presence in the telehealth space.

deliverables.title: Content Strategy
deliverables.description: Create content strategy and editorial calendar

deliverables.title: Visual Assets
deliverables.description: Design key visual assets and templates

milestones.title: Website & Landing Page Enhancement
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Optimize website performance and user experience to improve conversion rates and enhance patient engagement across all digital touchpoints.

deliverables.title: UX Audit
deliverables.description: Comprehensive UX analysis of current website

milestones.title: Digital Marketing Campaigns
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Design and implement comprehensive digital marketing campaigns to increase brand visibility and patient acquisition across multiple channels.

deliverables.title: PPC Campaign Setup
deliverables.description: Set up and launch PPC campaigns

milestones.title: SEO & Organic Growth Initiatives
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Implement strategic SEO optimizations and organic growth initiatives to improve search rankings and drive sustainable traffic growth.

milestones.title: Performance Tracking & Optimization
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Establish comprehensive performance monitoring systems and implement data-driven optimizations to maximize marketing ROI.

milestones.title: Scaling & Expansion
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Develop and execute strategic plans for market expansion and channel diversification to drive sustainable business growth.

milestones.title: Review & Long-Term Partnership
milestones.subHeading: Objective: Conduct comprehensive performance analysis and establish long-term strategic planning for sustained growth and partnership.
